textBox.richText: A flower bud hindered by the extremities Violent gusts rattle its petals, tucked and braced for bitter survival Storms thunder above the now withered flower Dust fills every crevice and petal Its petals slowly crinkle and turn brown And when all hope seems lost for the frail flower A gentle shower eases its struggle Sunshine grants nutrients and energy The damp soil slowly, but surely nurtures the flower And finally glistening beads of morning dew perch themselves, upon the silky petals of a fully bloomed flower.
